name: Across-Stitch
description:
Deductive logic puzzles with a colorful twist!


Enjoy 8 different cross-stitch variants that will keep you thinking in different ways. With a weave and some colorful thread, can you complete a pattern with only clues of which colors go in each row and column? Later on, stubborn thread will be thrown in that can only be stitched in certain spots!

Note

Puzzles are all randomly generated

Features

4 game modes with different difficulties, fabric sizes, and threads
4 additional game modes that put a twist to the stitching mechanics
Cross-stitch generator that works with uploaded JPG or PNG images
Download cross-stitches and share via code
